changelogversion.changelogtext: Fix search cyrillic in dictionary models
Add some types of e-receipt from FNS
Replace date in founded transactions after scan QR-code from transactions list
Fix display date in founded transactions list
Add button to toggle auto-focus in scan QR-code activity
Add font size to settings
Bugs fixes
Repair get electornic receipts from FNS server (additional in the 4pda forum)
Fix replace category of exists transactions after scan QR-code
Fix save payee after load products from electronic receipt
Fix auto-loading products after scan QR-code from transaction list page
(kasimm) Add last category for products downloaded by e-receipt
Bugs fixes
(Sovvateikin Sergei) Fix import products from CSV
(Sovvateikin Sergei) Fix skipping duplicates when import from CSV
(unwo) Add read json receipt from official app
Add check new version
Add button "All closed accounts" to account sets
Add "Close/Open account" to context menu of account
(unwo) Add department of product in transactions
Fixed error sign up or recovery code when request from FTS
Refactored loading electronic receipt from FTS
Added "Load QR-Code from gallery" button
Refactored window preference of FTS
Bugs fixes
Added button "Create backup for origin"
Fixed output sum in the simple dept window
Refactored pin-code settings window
Added partial sum when text search in transactions
Removed button "Recovery from Dropbox" when connections is closed
Bugs fixes
Many changes. Look changelog for Russian language
